Favoritism.Description: Character Skill: Increase Physical damage dealt by the party if Jack is Stunned.

EX Heal.Description: Blood Soul Skill: Restore HP to yourself.

Wonder Counter.Description: Partner Skill: When partner is attacked, there's a chance to perform a counterattack.

Mass. VY Blast.Description: Deal Air damage to all enemies.

Mass. Freeze.Description: Deal Water damage to one enemy.

Mass. Execution.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to inflict Death.

Mass. Brandish.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies.

Massacre Slash.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy.

Mass. Rage Rush.Description: Deal 3 hits of Neutral damage to one random enemy.

Mass. Evasive Dance.Description: Place a buff on one ally for several turns, which increases evasion.

Bulwark.Description: Character Skill: Increase damage dealt by the party by if Red Riding Hood's HP is at 75% or less.

Regeneration.Description: Blood Soul Skill: Place a buff on all allies for 4 turns, which restores Max HP each turn.

Sealed Lips.Description: Partner Skill: When partner attacks one enemy, there's a chance to perform a follow up attack that can inflict Skill Seal.

Mass. Flame Pillar.Description: Deal Fire damage to all enemies.

Mass. Inferno.Description: Deal Fire damage to all enemies.

Mass. Lightning Wave.Description: Deal Lightning damage to all enemies.

Mass. Lightning.Description: Deal Lightning damage to one enemy.

Mass. Recovery.Description: Remove all ailments from one ally.

Mass. Attack Blocker.Description: Place a buff on one ally for several turns, which gives them a shield that blocks a certain amount of Physical damage.

Mass. Resist Fire.Description: Place a buff on one ally for several turns, which decreases Fire damage taken.

Dignity.Description: Character Skill: Increase Magical damage dealt by the party if the last two digits of Thumbelina's HP are the same.

Resist Magic.Description: Blood Soul Skill: Place a buff on all allies for 3 turns, which decreases Magical damage taken.

Honey Flower.Description: Partner Skill: When partner acts, there's a chance to restore part of their max HP.

Mass. Sand Shale.Description: Deal Earth damage to all enemies.

Mass. Sandstorm.Description: Deal Earth damage to all enemies.

Mass. Grand Quake.Description: Deal Earth damage to one enemy.

Mass. Aerial Impact.Description: Deal Air damage to all enemies.

Mass. Stun Burst.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies, with a chance to inflict Stun.

Mass. Succubus.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy, then spend Max SP.

Mass. Darkness.Description: Chance to inflict Darkness to all enemies.

Concern.Description: Character Skill: Increase damage dealt by the party by if the last digit of Snow White's HP is 7.

Prayer.Description: Blood Soul Skill: Restore SP to yourself.

Poisoned Apple.Description: Partner Skill: When partner attacks one enemy, there's a chance to perform a follow up attack that can inflict Poison.

Mass. Freeze.Description: Deal Air damage to one enemy.

Mass. Frost Burst.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies, with a chance to inflict Frostbite.

Mass. Darkness.Description: Chance to inflict Darkness to all enemies.

Mass. Sleep.Description: Chance to inflict Sleep to all enemies.

Tribute.Description: Character Skill: Decrease Elemental damage taken by the party if Sleeping Beauty is Poisoned.

Proofing.Description: Blood Soul Skill: Place a buff on all allies until the end of their next turn, which increases critical rate.

Dark Thorn.Description: Partner Skill: When partner attacks one enemy, there's a chance to perform a follow up attack that can inflict Darkness.

Mass. Torrent Blade.Description: Deal Water damage to one enemy.

Mass. Gravity Pull.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies.

Mass. Impact Shock.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy.

Mass. Assault Break.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy, with chance to apply an ATK debuff.

Mass. Guard Break.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy, with chance to apply a DEF debuff.

Mass. Action Break.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy, with chance to apply a turn speed debuff.

Mass. Frost Burst.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies, with a chance to inflict Frostbite.

Compassion.Description: Character skill: Chance of restoring Max HP to all party members when Gretel takes Magical damage.

Full Prayer.Description: Blood Soul Skill: Restore SP to the whole party.

Test Subject.Description: Partner Skill: When partner attacks one enemy, there's a chance to perform a follow up attack that can inflict Stun.

Mass. Rising Flame.Description: Deal Fire damage to all enemies.

Mass. Blaze.Description: Deal Fire damage to one enemy.

Mass. Shock Blast.Description: Deal Air damage to all enemies.

Mass. Flash Blade.Description: Deal Water damage to all enemies.

Mass. Seal Burst.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies, with a chance to inflict Skill Seal.

Mass. Brandish.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies.

Mass. Instant Death.Description: Chance to inflict Death to all enemies.

Fortitude.Description: Character Skill: Chance of decreasing Physical damage taken by the party by if Rapunzel's HP is at 75% or less.

Resist Attack.Description: Blood Soul Skill: Place a buff on all allies for 3 turns, which decreases Physical damage taken.

I'm Hungry!.Description: Partner Skill: When partner attacks one enemy, there's a chance to perform a follow up attack.

Mass. Lightning Wave.Description: Deal Lightning damage to all enemies.

Mass. EX Vortex.Description: Deal Water damage to all enemies.

Mass. Shock.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy.

Massacre Blast.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy.

Mass. Stun Burst.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies, with a chance to inflict Stun.

Mass. Brandish.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies.

Mass. Darkness.Description: Chance to inflict Darkness to all enemies.

Proclamation.Description: Character Skill: If Cinderella's HP is at 50% or less and she hits an enemy's weakness, another random ally will perform an additional attack on that enemy.

Healia.Description: Blood Soul Skill: Restore HP to all allies.

Ballroom Dance.Description: Partner Skill: When partner attacks one enemy while at full HP, 20% chance to perform a follow up attack.

Mass. Sandstorm.Description: Deal Earth damage to all enemies.

Mass. Rock Blast.Description: Deal Earth damage to all enemies.

Mass. Rising Flame.Description: Deal Fire damage to all enemies.

Mass. Hypno Burst.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies, with a chance to inflict Sleep.

Mass. Ruin.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy, with chance to apply a DEF debuff.

Mass. Seal.Description: Chance to inflict Skill Seal to all enemies.

Resistance.Description: Character Skill: Chance of decreasing Magical damage taken by the party if Kaguya's HP is at 75% or less.

Hollow Vision.Description: Place a buff on all allies for 3 turns, which increases accuracy and evasion.

Looter.Description: When partner attacks one enemy, there's a chance to steal Gold(50% of their base yield) or an item(max once per enemy) from the target.

Mass. Flame Pillar.Description: Deal Fire damage to all enemies.

Mass. Inferno.Description: Deal Fire damage to all enemies.

Mass. Aerial Impact.Description: Deal Air damage to all enemies.

Mass. Sutra.Description: Deal Air damage to one enemy.

Mass. Blitz.Description: Deal Lightning damage to one enemy.

Mass. Stun Burst.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies, with a chance to inflict Stun.

Mass. Spirit Bomb.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies, then spend Max SP.

Atonement.Description: Character Skill: Increase critical rate of the party if the last digit of Hameln's HP is 7.

Recovery.Description: Blood Soul: Remove ailments from the targets.

Piper's Melody.Description: Partner Skill: When partner acts, there's chance to restore their Max SP.

Mass. Sandstorm.Description: Deal Earth damage to all enemies.

Mass. Lightning Wave.Description: Deal Lightning damage to all enemies.

Mass. Keraunos Spark.Description: Deal Lightning damage to all enemies.

Mass. Poison Burst.Description: Deal Neutral damage to all enemies, with a chance to inflict Poison.

Mass. Blast.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy. This skill consumes all SP, and power depends on the percentage of Max SP spent. (Level up has no effect)

Mass. Vile Drain.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to drain part of the damage dealt.

Mass. Succubus.Description: Deal Neutral damage to one enemy, then spend Max SP.

Fighter.Description: An offense-oriented, front-line job. The job doesn't offer much in Skills, but is augmented well in stats.

Invisible Slash.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to one enemy.

Pound.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to one enemy.

Water Attack.Description: Deal Physical Water damage to one enemy.

Surge.Description: Deal Physical Water damage to one enemy.

Charge.Description: Place a buff on yourself until the end of your next turn, which strongly increases ATK.

Paladin.Description: A defense-oriented, front-line job. A bit lacking in offense, but great at being a shield.

Paladin Skill.Description: Decrease the power of Physical attacks used by you or against you.

Darkness Bullet+.Description: Deal Magical Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to inflict Darkness.

Cover.Description: Place a buff on yourself for one turn, which forces single-target attacks to target you and decreases damage taken.

Intimidate.Description: Place a buff on yourself for several turns, which increases the chance of being targeted by enemies.

Resist Attack.Description: Place a buff on one ally for several turns, which decreases Physical damage taken.

Marshal.Description: A speed-oriented attacker. Excels in inflicting damage by numbers.

Marshal Skill.Description: Normal attacks have a chance to be performed twice.

Counter.Description: Chance to counterattack upon taking Physical damage.

First Strike.Description: Chance of getting an extra turn at the start of battle. (Separate from the AGI-based initial turn)

Poison Bullet.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to inflict Poison.

Force Wave.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to all enemies.

Amber Red.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to all enemies.

Rage Rush.Description: Deal multiple hits of Physical Neutral damage to one random enemy.

Destroyer.Description: An attacker that sacrifices defense for power, allowing it to deal massive damage.

Destroyer Skill.Description: Increase the power of Physical attacks used by you or against you.

Flash Impact.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to all enemies.

Shock.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to one enemy.

Desperation.Description: Place a buff on yourself for several turns, which increases ATK but sets DEF to 1.

Wild Charge.Description: Place a buff on yourself for several turns, which increases the critical damage bonus and sets critical rate to 100% but decreases accuracy. (Overrides Blood Lord's Critical Output Up)

Blood Lord.Description: A job with the most proficient command in wielding blood-based abilities.

Blood Lord Skill.Description: All your attacks have a chance to inflict Bleed.

Commander.Description: Increase the Bleed amount caused by your attacks.

Blood Cleave.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to one enemy, inflicting Bleed.

Blood Wound.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to one enemy, inflicting Bleed.

Blood Raptor.Description: Deal Magical Neutral damage to one enemy, inflicting Bleed.

Torrent Blade.Description: Deal Magical Water damage to one enemy.

Earth Cannon.Description: Deal Magical Earth damage to one enemy.

Keraunos.Description: Deal Magical Lightning damage to one enemy.

Libero.Description: An all-rounder with numerous Skill slots. Can use attack and support-based Skills.

Counter.Description: Chance to counterattack upon taking Physical damage.

Splash Bomb.Description: Deal Magical Water damage to one enemy.

Fire Attack.Description: Deal Magical Fire damage to one enemy.

Keraunos.Description: Deal Magical Lightning damage to one enemy.

VY Blast.Description: Deal Magical Wind damage to all enemies.

Poet.Description: A support role specializing in buffs. Poets heal and support allies through their songs.

Poet Skill.Description: Decrease the SP cost of buff skills.

Blow.Description: Place a buff on one ally for several turns, which increases Physical damage dealt.

Invigorate.Description: Place a buff on one ally for several turns, which increases turn speed.

Resist Attack.Description: Place a buff on one ally for several turns, which decreases Physical damage taken.

Resist Skill.Description: Place a buff on all allies for several turns, which decreases Magical damage taken.

Skill Seal Recovery.Description: Remove Skill Seal from one ally.

Fairy.Description: A versatile job that uses debuffs and attack Skills. Its dance means imminent death.

Magic Counter.Description: Chance to counterattack upon taking Magical damage.

Drain.Description: Deal Magical Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to drain part of the damage dealt.

Darkness Bullet.Description: Deal Magical Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to inflict Darkness.

Hypno Bullet.Description: Deal Magical Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to inflict Sleep.

Frost Bullet.Description: Deal Magical Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to inflict Frostbite.

Poison Bullet+.Description: Deal Magical Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to inflict Poison.

Debilitate.Description: Deal Magical Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to inflict Stun.

Execution.Description: Deal Magical Neutral damage to one enemy, with a chance to inflict Death.

Charge.Description: Place a buff on yourself until the end of your next turn, which strongly increases ATK.

Attack Stall.Description: Place a debuff on one enemy for several turns, which decreases ATK.

Defense Stall.Description: Place a debuff on one enemy for several turns, which decreases DEF.

Tech Stall.Description: Place a debuff on one enemy for several turns, which decreases TEC.

Mental Stall.Description: Place a debuff on one enemy for several turns, which decreases MEN.

Impede.Description: Place a debuff on one enemy for several turns, which decreases turn speed.

Pierrot.Description: A unique job with random, double-edged Skills. Its impact in battle is up to fate.

Pierrot Skill.Description: Chance to increase the power of attacks used and received.

Endure.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to one enemy, then spend Max HP.

Spirit Attack.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to one enemy, then spend Max SP.

Lunacy.Description: Deal Magical Random-Element damage to one enemy.

Cluster.Description: Deal Magical Random-Element damage to all enemies.

Offering.Description: Sacrifice 1 to 3 items, then deal Physical Neutral damage to one enemy. Each item spent adds to the power of the attack. (Every item gives a different bonus)

Leech.Description: A unique job that draws power from enemies' blood to strike with unimaginable strength.

Leech Skill.Description:
Increase or decrease the power of attacks used based on your Splatter Gauge level:
-From 0% to 49%: Remove 10% power.
-From 50% to 100%: Add [(Gauge%-50%)/2] power.

Bloody Maneuver.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to all enemies, inflicting Bleed.

Mass. Blast.Description: Deal Physical Neutral damage to one enemy. This skill consumes all SP, and power depends on the percentage of Max SP spent. (Level up has no effect)

Blood Raptor.Description: Deal Magical Neutral damage to one enemy, inflicting Bleed.

Magician.Description: A skill-oriented, rear-line job. Its powerful magic makes up for its lower defense.

Therapist.Description: A specialist in healing who can restore HP, heal ailments, and even revive allies.

Counselor.Description: A job that specializes in providing support to party members through buffs.

Necromancer.Description: A job that specializes in weakening enemies through debuffs.

Blood Witch.Description: A job that masterfully uses blood-based attacks on the battlefield.

Scientist.Description: A support role that can inflict ailments onto enemies and use buffs to help allies.

Item Meister.Description: A specialist in using Skills and items to change the course of battle.

Mimic.Description: A specialist that can analyze enemies and take on the skills of those they defeat.

Logic.Description: A Jail specialist who utilizes Jail Bonuses to bring a number of benefits to the party.

Blood Chemist.Description: A job that experiments with powerful blood-based Skills to deal heavy damage to enemies.

Archer.Description: A long range attacker with an abundance of SP, dealing damage from a safe distance.

Sniper.Description: A versatile, long-range job with a high hit rate and buff/debuff Skills.

Speed Gunner.Description: An attacker that deals damage in battle with profound speed.

Dark Seeker.Description: An attacker that moves in stealth, unleashing powerful attacks from the shadows.

Blood Hunter.Description: Blood Hunters can steal items from enemies, and have high hit and evasion rates.

Sakura Maiden.Description: An all-rounder adept in any position, whether attacking, healing, or providing support.
